dmca.title: [EV1-C1425980S] Copyright Infringement
dmca.body:
-----Original Message----- From: abuse@ev1.net [mailto:abuse@ev1.net] Posted At: Wednesday, October 18, 2006 7:02 AM Posted To: DMCA Houston Conversation: [EV1-C1425980S] Copyright Infringement Subject: [EV1-C1425980S] Copyright Infringement ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== 1. Copyright Infringement Added by system at Wednesday, Oct 18 2006 10:39 am X-MailFrom: adepi.internet@gmail.com X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net Received: from [207.218.192.50] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for ; Wed Oct 18 11:38:32 2006 Received: from SMTP32-FWD by mail.ev1.net (SMTP32) id A0000067C; Wed, 18 Oct 2006 11:37:27 -0500 Received: from mx03.filter.theplanet.com [207.218.221.229] by mail.ev1.net with ESMTP (SMTPD32-6.06) id A8456D4D011A; Wed, 18 Oct 2006 11:37:25 -0500 Return-path: Delivery-date: Wed, 18 Oct 2006 11:38:25 -0500 Received: from nf-out-0910.google.com ([64.233.182.184]) by mx03.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from adepi.internet@gmail.com) with esmtp (Exim) id 1GaEHE-000DJu-WC for abuse@ev1.net; Wed, 18 Oct 2006 11:28:21 -0500 Received: by nf-out-0910.google.com with SMTP id l35so746421nfa for ; Wed, 18 Oct 2006 09:28:21 -0700 (PDT) DomainKey-Signature: a=rsa-sha1; q=dns; c=nofws; s=beta; d=gmail.com; h=received:message-id:date:from:to:subject:mime-version:content-type; b=A6qSxn/UNBfrtdRK7R5onI8vAUdFsHHXtbZ54A/4UudK6zNQyysY/6J7DmRa00RnJeWyzUU+zu8KkoLWzCmiZilupyatqh89HqbfcS+NB5qShrhCZPSG0DacHzymrNVmcZS3UySuRqBgcgr0zIurUQjkwPfMq5RIdRt4byoxiLE= Received: by 10.49.90.4 with SMTP id s4mr4079049nfl; Wed, 18 Oct 2006 09:28:15 -0700 (PDT) Received: by 10.49.36.14 with HTTP; Wed, 18 Oct 2006 09:28:14 -0700 (PDT) Message-ID: <411e9ea50610180928m6aa2ac69tcd7676329566f7a5@mail.gmail.com> Date: Wed, 18 Oct 2006 14:28:15 -0200 From: "Adepi - Departamento de Internet" To: abuse@ev1.net Subject: Copyright Infringement MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/alternative; boundary="----=_Part_130857_24383026.1161188895025" Received-SPF: pass (mx03.filter.theplanet.com: domain of gmail.com designates 64.233.182.184 as permitted sender) client-ip=64.233.182.184; envelope-from=adepi.internet@gmail.com; helo=nf-out-0910.google.com; X-Declude-Sender: adepi.internet@gmail.com [207.218.221.229] X-Spam-Tests-Failed: None [0] X-Note: This E-mail was sent from mx03.filter.theplanet.com ([207.218.221.229]). (multipart/alternative) MIME element (text/plain) *Dear Provider* ADEPI represents The Motion Picture Association (MPA) in Brazil, who represents the following motion picture production and distribution companies: *Columbia Pictures Industries, Inc. Disney Enterprises, Inc. Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer Studios Inc. Paramount Pictures Corporation TriStar Pictures, Inc. Twentieth Century Fox Film Corporation United Artists Pictures, Inc. United Artists Corporation Universal City Studios, LLLP Warner Bros. Entertainment Inc. * * * We have received information that you are apparently providing Internet access to and possibly hosting pirate material at url: http://www.centralfilmes.com which is offering copyrighted motion picture. The distribution of unauthorized copies of copyrighted motion pictures constitutes copyright infringement under the Brazilian Copyright Law # 9610/98 and Criminal Code, section 184. This conduct may also violate the laws of other countries, international law, and/or treaty obligations. If this information were confirmed we request that you do the following: 1) Disable access to this site; 2) Remove this site from your server; and 3) Take appropriate action against the account holder under your Abuse Policy/Terms of Service Agreement. By copy of this letter, the owner of the above-referenced Internet site and/or email account is hereby directed to cease and desist from the conduct complained of herein. On behalf of the respective owners of the exclusive rights to the copyrighted material at issue in this notice, we hereby state, that we have a good faith belief that use of the material in the manner complained of is not authorized by the copyright owners, their respective agents, or the law. Also, we hereby state, under penalty of perjury, that the information in this notification is accurate and that we are authorized to act on behalf of the owners of the exclusive rights being infringed as set forth in this notification. Please contact us replying this email. We thank you for your cooperation in this matter. Your prompt response is requested. Respectfully -- ADEPI - Associação de Defesa da Propriedade Intelectual Departamento de Internet www.adepi.org.br Tel (11) 3826-7479 Fax (11) 3828-1559 MIME element (text/html)

Dear Provider

ADEPI represents The Motion Picture Association (MPA) in Brazil, who represents the following motion picture production and distribution companies:

Columbia Pictures Industries, Inc.
Disney Enterprises, Inc.
Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer Studios Inc.
Paramount Pictures Corporation
TriStar Pictures, Inc.
Twentieth Century Fox Film Corporation
United Artists Pictures, Inc.
United Artists Corporation
Universal City Studios, LLLP
Warner Bros. Entertainment Inc. 


 
We have received information that you are apparently providing Internet access to and possibly hosting pirate material at url:
 

http://www.centralfilmes.com

 

which is offering  copyrighted motion picture. The distribution of unauthorized copies of copyrighted motion pictures constitutes copyright infringement under the Brazilian Copyright Law # 9610/98 and Criminal Code, section 184. This conduct may also violate the laws of other countries, international law, and/or treaty obligations.

If this information were confirmed we request that you do the following:

1) Disable access to this site;
2) Remove this site from your server; and
3) Take appropriate action against the account holder under your Abuse Policy/Terms of Service Agreement.

By copy of this letter, the owner of the above-referenced Internet site and/or email account is hereby directed to cease and desist from the conduct complained of herein.

On behalf of the respective owners of the exclusive rights to the copyrighted material at issue in this notice, we hereby state, that we have a good faith belief that use of the material in the manner complained of is not authorized by the copyright owners, their respective agents, or the law.

Also, we hereby state, under penalty of perjury, that the information in this notification is accurate and that we are authorized to act on behalf of the owners of the exclusive rights being infringed as set forth in this notification.

Please contact us replying this email.

We thank you for your cooperation in this matter.  Your prompt response is requested.

Respectfully

 




--
ADEPI - Associação de Defesa da Propriedade Intelectual
Departamento de Internet
www.adepi.org.br
Tel  (11) 3826-7479  
Fax (11) 3828-1559
           MIME element (text/plain)
